Package org.apache.pekko.stream

Interface StreamRefSettings

  • public interface StreamRefSettings
    Settings specific to SourceRef and SinkRef. More detailed documentation about each of the settings is available in reference.conf.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int bufferCapacity()
      Deprecated.
      Use attribute 'StreamRefAttributes.BufferCapacity' to read the concrete setting value.
      scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration demandRedeliveryInterval()
      Deprecated.
      Use attribute 'StreamRefAttributes.DemandRedeliveryInterval' to read the concrete setting value.
      scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration finalTerminationSignalDeadline()
      Deprecated.
      Use attribute 'StreamRefAttributes.FinalTerminationSignalDeadline' to read the concrete setting value.
      scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration subscriptionTimeout()
      Deprecated.
      Use attribute 'StreamRefAttributes.SubscriptionTimeout' to read the concrete setting value.
      StreamRefSettings withBufferCapacity​(int value)  
      StreamRefSettings withDemandRedeliveryInterval​(scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration value)  
      StreamRefSettings withSubscriptionTimeout​(scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration value)  
      StreamRefSettings withTerminationReceivedBeforeCompletionLeeway​(scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration value)  

    • Method Detail

      • bufferCapacity

        int bufferCapacity()
        Deprecated.
        Use attribute 'StreamRefAttributes.BufferCapacity' to read the concrete setting value. Since Akka 2.6.0.

        Deprecated.
        Use attribute 'StreamRefAttributes.DemandRedeliveryInterval' to read the concrete setting value. Since Akka 2.6.0.

      • subscriptionTimeout

        Deprecated.
        Use attribute 'StreamRefAttributes.SubscriptionTimeout' to read the concrete setting value. Since Akka 2.6.0.

        Deprecated.
        Use attribute 'StreamRefAttributes.FinalTerminationSignalDeadline' to read the concrete setting value. Since Akka 2.6.0.
